metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33120 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Out of bounds read under complex microarchitectural condition in memorysubsystem for some Intel Atom(R) Processors may allow authenticated user topotentially enable information disclosure or cause denial of service vianetwork access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
